text: Jocelyn Benson (born October 22, 1977) is an American Democratic Party politician. She is the 43rd Secretary of State of Michigan since 2019. In January 2025, Benson announced her candidacy for governor of Michigan in the 2026 gubernatorial election. ==References== Category:1977 births Category:Living people Category:Academics from Michigan Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Politicians from Pittsburgh Category:Politicians from Michigan Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Jocelyn Benson
